## IInteractionStateChangeCallbacks.onDragStart() method

Return `true` to indicate that dragging is allowed systemically. To indicate that an entity should be dragged, have the entity's onDragStart return true too.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onDragStart(targets: readonly HitTestResult<unknown, TTraits>[], $event: IChartPointerEvent<PointerEvent>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  targets | readonly [HitTestResult](./core.hittestresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;unknown, TTraits&gt;\[\] |  |
|  $event | [IChartPointerEvent](./core.ichartpointerevent.md)<!-- -->&lt;PointerEvent&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
